casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Norfolk Junior BEST 300A93-3 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 16, 2018 Jonathan P. Babb, Special Counsel to Attorney General, Jon David, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina Michael L. Unti, Raleigh, Jay H. Ferguson, Durham, Erica W. Washington, Attorneys at Law, for Best, Norfolk Junior

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 15th of August 2018 by State of NC for Extension of Time to Respond to Petition for Writ of Certiorari:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 16th of August 2018."
